name: test_e2e_with_logs[005_SQLI_2ND_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_2ND_005` |
| **Name** | Second-order error-based injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | second_order |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `value' AND EXTRACTVALUE(1,CONCAT(0x7e,version(),0x7e)) --`
- **Encoded**: `value%27%20AND%20EXTRACTVALUE%281%2CCONCAT%280x7e%2Cversion%28%29%2C0x7e%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~45000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:32.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_2ND_005-1772192192167-zc1cz pattern_id=SQLI_2ND_005 uri=/?q=value%27%20AND%20EXTRACTVALUE%281%2CCONCAT%280x7e%2Cversion%28%29%2C0x7e%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
